articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Why are there analyses of inaugural speeches by Texan presidents on this page?
articles.contents:
Lars HinrichsWelcome
My name is Lars Hinrichs. You can find more information about me here, and about the Texas English Linguistics Lab here.
Presented on this blog are some analyses of the language that was used in the “Texan” inaugural addresses that the country has had so far. I made these to prepare for our segment about Texan inaugurals on The Texas Standard.

The Texas Standard, hosted by David Brown, is a news magazine that airs weekdays on KUT Public Radio in Austin.
The producer of the Texan Translation segment is Michael Marks.
